sep.gaia.renderer.layer

Class AbstractLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.AbstractLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableLayer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BBoxDebugLayer, CompassLayer, CopyrightLayer, MarkerLayer, POILayer, ScreenshotLayer, TileLayer, WeatherLayer, WikipediaLayer

    public abstract class AbstractLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawableLayer
    Implements the DrawableLayer interface and implements the add(DrawableLayer layer) method. The draw(GL2 gl) method is abstract, because it's the task of every concrete layer to implement this method (the render process).
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractLayer()
      This constructor is for all layers that don't need any ResourceAdapter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(DrawableLayer layer)
      Let this DrawableLayer implementation add another DrawableLayer whose draw is called, after this DrawableLayer has finished its render process.
      abstract void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl, float height)
      The render process of this layer takes place in this method.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
        float height)
        Description copied from interface: DrawableLayer
        The render process of this layer takes place in this method. After this layer has finished, it's calling it's calling another DrawableLayer to render its content (if another DrawableLayer is specified).
        Specified by:
        draw in interface DrawableLayer
        Parameters:
        gl - The GL context in which the layers renders its content.
        height - The logical height of this layer. If a layer l2 should be drawn over l1, that are drawn via l1.draw(gl, h1) and l2.draw(gl, h2) respectively, then h2 must be greater than h1.

      • add

        public void add(DrawableLayer layer)
        Description copied from interface: DrawableLayer
        Let this DrawableLayer implementation add another DrawableLayer whose draw is called, after this DrawableLayer has finished its render process.
        Specified by:
        add in interface DrawableLayer
